Text: Re Customer Account s Simon Cc Vinay please find a listing of all the Simon Non pass through electric accounts Richard mentioned that there may be opportunities in other states so I have not narrowed the listing down to Massachusetts Please let me know if you need more information Victor Gonzalez AM To Robert ES Ben ES cc Debra ES Whitney ES Robert ES John ES Rhonda ES Vinay ES Richard ES Subject Customer Account s Bob Ben Richard Ring with the Power desk is needing information on accounts under your management see email below Can you please forward this request to the appropriate persons to respond to the request thanks Victor Forwarded by Victor GonzalezHOUEES on AM Vinay Adenwala PM To Victor ES cc Richard ES Subject Customer Account s Hello Victor My name is Vini Adenwala Im doing some research for Narsimha Misra and Richard Ring for the East Power Risk Mgmt Dept and I wanted to ask you for some information regarding our customers in Massachusetts I have a list of contracts here Polaroid Corporation Quebecor Printing USA Corp Simon Property Corp Sonoco Products Co Lucent Technologies Inc Haverhill Police Station BICC General Cable Industries Inc What I need to get from you is a customer list along w their account s for each of these contracts and Richard told me you were the person I should talk to If you could provide me with a list of the individuals responsible for billing each account or even the customer acct s themselves I would greatly appreciate it Thank you for your time and cooperation Regards Vinay Adenwala
